p: Plant material of L.S Cuatrec., O.F (Kunth) Decne. and Planch. (O.F), P.F Kunth and P.B (H.J.P. Winkl.) Standl (P.B) was collected during August and September 2013, in the eastern of the Department of Antioquia, Colombia ( Table-1). Framework contract No. 234, RGE 289. Voucher specimens were kept at the University of Antioquia Herbarium (HUA)
